pageContext.claim: “The far-left media has spread terrible lies and stories about the Trump administration and the tens of millions of people who make up our great movement, the greatest political movement in the history of our country. The greatest! The greatest. The greatest movement in the history of our country, and they don't even refute that fact. It is possibly the greatest political movement anywhere.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump has been questioned about this claim. The abolitionist movement, the civil rights movement, the women's suffrage movement, the anti-fascist movement during World War II, the anti-Apartheid movement and the global human rights movement all come to mind, just to name a few. Trump's case would be stronger had he won the popular vote in 2016 -- or was re-elected in 2020.
